description:
The popular idol Kashima Noa is named the honorary railway security team leader for the day, and K4 is appointed to guard her. They accompany Noa on the Odoriko special express to a JNR-sponsored event taking place on a beach near Ito Station.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I Think I Might Like It
気に入っちゃったかもね
